code: import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import'./InfoBox.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InfoBox=_ref=>{let{title,subtitle,sections,onToggle}=_ref;const[isCollapsed,setIsCollapsed]=useState(false);const headerRef=useRef(null);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info-box ".concat(isCollapsed?'collapsed':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"info-box-header",ref:headerRef,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),subtitle&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"info-box-subtitle",children:subtitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hamburger",onClick:()=>setIsCollapsed(!isCollapsed),"aria-label":isCollapsed?'Expandir panel':'Colapsar panel',children:"\u2630"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"info-box-content",children:!isCollapsed&&sections.map((section,sectionIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"legend-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"legend-title-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"legend-title",children:section.title})}),section.items.map((item,itemIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"legend-row",children:!item.isButton&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shape ".concat(item.shape),style:{backgroundColor:item.color,width:12,height:12}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{fontSize:'12px'},children:item.label}),item.switch&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",onChange:()=>onToggle&&onToggle(item.id),checked:item.checked}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"slider"})]})]})},itemIndex))]},sectionIndex))})]});};export default InfoBox;
